name: Factory Toy Horror
description:
Factory Toy Horror is an action horror, this game combines several genres, horror genre and puzzles, various quests and adventures, as well as survival in a scary toy factory.

Your task is that you need to get out of an old abandoned toy factory, but it will not be so easy, various tests and riddles are waiting for you on the way, which are not so easy to pass, you will also be haunted by a scary plush toy.

You have to explore and go through the whole huge location, passing all the puzzles and riddles along the way to find a way out, on the way to the exit, try to solve the secret of the factory, understand what happened here.

You have a lot of opportunities to reach your goal, you just need to use them correctly to cope with all the difficulties.

The game will immerse you in its atmosphere and the creepy world of toys, the game will give you a lot of emotions and pleasure and fear.
